messages.title: I promise that I will:
messages.content: remain committed to our communities, keep fighting for local people, carry on being available for residents, only ever make sensible expense claims, continue to back local businesses.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Regular visits to local schools, welcome groups to Parliament, making myself accessible to community groups.
Campaign against solicitors who wrongly deducted money from miners' claims which returned over Â£300,000 to constituents.
Maintaining an office in the constituency and holding regular advice surgeries.
Making sensible expense claims in light of shocking claims by some MPs, never having to pay any money back.
Supported many local businesses over the years both by visiting companies and giving practical help.

endorsements.endorsement: Sure Start has been a big help in giving our children a good start in life. Labour should be proud of what it has done for young families.

quotes.text: Sure Start has been a big help in giving our children a good start in life. Labour should be proud of what it has done for young families.
